actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to allow land in the water bank to be eligible for the conservation reserve if it is otherwise eligible, but does not qualify as having been planted or considered planted in 2 of the 5 crop years 1981 through 1985.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to permit certain land in the water bank program to be enrolled in the conservation reserve program.

titles.title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to allow land in the water bank to be eligible for the conservation reserve if it is otherwise eligible, but does not qualify as having been planted or considered planted in 2 of the 5 crop years 1981 through 1985.
